software.name: odoo
software.description:
Grow Your Business With Odoo Apps
One need, one app. Integration has never been so smooth.
software.custom_start_script:
#!/bin/sh
cd /home/app

fresh=""
if test -f /home/app/log/odoo/fresh
 then
   fresh="-i all"
   rm /home/app/log/odoo/fresh
fi
PID_FILE=/home/app/logs/odoo.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
mkdir -p  /engines/var/run/flags/

./openerp-gevent -c debian/openerp-server.conf $fresh -d $dbname -r $dbuser   --db_password=$dbpasswd --db_host=$dbhost --without-demo="all"  -D $VOLDIR/     --smtp=_Engines_System(smtp_host) --email-from=$from_email  --timezone=$TZ --pidfile=/home/app/logs/odoo.pid &

touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
 wait 
 rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
software.custom_install_script:
cd /home/app/local
python setup.py install
cd /home/app
python setup.py install
mkdir -p /home/app/log/odoo
mkdir -p /home/app/odoo/addons
mkdir -p /home/app/addons
touch /home/app/log/odoo/fresh

template_files.title: debian/openerp-server.conf
template_files.content:
[options]
; This is the password that allows database operations:
db_host = _Engines_Environment(dbhost)
db_port = False
db_user = _Engines_Environment(dbuser)
db_password = _Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)
db_name = _Engines_Environment(dbname)
admin_passwd = admin
addons_path = /home/app/addons,/home/app/addons,/home/app/openerp/addons,/home/app/odoo/addons
smtp_server=_Engines_System(smtp_host)

software.installation_report_template:
Goto _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/
Select Database _Engines_Environment(dbname)
login admin
password admin
